skills.title: Languages
skills.description: Mastery in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript , with a focus on crafting clean, semantic, and accessible code.

skills.title: Frameworks/Libraries
skills.description: Extensive experience with modern front-end frameworks and libraries including React.js, Bootstrap adept at leveraging their features to build dynamic and interactive user interfaces.

skills.title: Performance Optimization
skills.description: Skilled in optimizing front-end performance through code splitting, lazy loading, minification, and other optimization techniques to deliver fast and efficient web experiences.

skills.title: Responsive Design
skills.description: Proficient in creating responsive and adaptive layouts using CSS media queries, flexbox, and grid to ensure optimal viewing experiences across devices and screen sizes.
